name: INVASION - a Space Invaders Tribute
description:
Hej, glad you found this page.

Invasion was created in a small development project for university, the task was to create a Space Invaders inspired game with differenct mechanics like a scoresystem, different enemies etc.

Although it's a really small project I wanted to create a great atmosphere while yo're playing the game, hopefully I could fulfill this idea. I am happy about any kind of feedback!
